name: Paldean Tauros (Aqua Breed)
description: The Wild Bull Pokémon. This Pokémon blasts water from holes on the tips of its horns—the high-pressure jets pierce right through Tauros’s enemies.

abilities.name: Intimidate
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Anger Point
abilities.description: After suffering a critical hit, this Pokémon doubles the damage dice for a single move it activates on the following turn.

abilities.name: Cud Chew
abilities.description: After consuming a berry, on the following turn, this Pokémon may consume the berry a second time, thereafter consuming it permanently.
